p:
Stratifying the Mayo and the UW samples according to SNP24 genotypes revealed a decreasing tendency in SORL1-38b levels in carriers of the risk genotype T/T of SNP24 (rs2282649) (Fig. 5d, e) ( p
meta = 0.14, analysis adjusted for AD status) (Fig. 5f). To determine if SNP24 is a true eQTL for SORL1-38b levels, a larger number of samples is needed, with both genotypes and E38b transcript levels available.
